price: 48. Dan apabila dikatakan kepada mereka, “Rukuklah,” mereka tidak mau rukuk.*(891)
arabic: وَإِذَا قِيلَ لَهُمُ ٱرۡكَعُواْ لَا يَرۡكَعُونَ
footnotes: *891). Sebagian mufassir mengatakan, bahwa yang dimaksud rukuk di sini ialah tunduk kepada perintah Allah; dan sebagian yang lainnya mengatakan, maksudnya ialah salat.

version.title: Indonesian Translation - Sabeq Company
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Indonesian by Sabeq Company, printed in 2016. corrected by Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: wa-idhā qīla lahumu ir'kaʿū lā yarkaʿūna
